name: Zombie Z
description:
ZOMBIE ENDLESS RUNNER LIKES NO OTHER!

WHY?

* Awesome graphic quality!

* Simplified control (Auto-shooting & tap to run like HELL).

* Full of Zombies to KILL.

* Tons of Gears to UPGRADE!

* Challenging level design! It's a HARD GAME!

* Play with friends on Facebook & Twitter and compare HIGH-SCORE!
